hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:they used to buy and sell during the time of the Messenger of Allah at the top of the marketplace without measuring. The Messenger of Allah forbade them to sell it in the place where they had bought it until they moved it

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ مَا يُشْتَرَى مِنَ الطَّعَامِ جُزَافًا قَبْلَ أَنْ يُنْقَلَ مِنْ مَكَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: .Selling food that one has Bought Unmeasured before removing it from the Place of Sale
